etymology.description: 皀(皀) (bǐ, "ancient round-mouthed food vessel") + 卩(卩) (jié, "to kneel") = to come near to eat or approach -> immediately
etymology.interpretation: The character 即(即) (jí, "immediately") combines the image of an ancient food vessel and a person kneeling, suggesting approaching the vessel to eat quickly, an action that requires immediacy.

examples.chinese: 他听到警报后(他聽到警報後)，即跑出房间(即跑出房間)。
examples.pinyin: Tā tīng dào jǐngbào hòu, jí pǎo chū fángjiān.
examples.english: After he heard the alarm, he immediately ran out of the room.

examples.chinese: 遇到危险即行动(遇到危險即行動)。
暴风雨即至(暴風雨即至)。
